solutions: Use v2.x for CommonJS: npm i terminal-link@2
Or use dynamic import: const { default: terminalLink } = await import('terminal-link')
Check for ESM support in your bundler

common_errors.pattern: link not clickable|plain text|OSC 8 not working
solutions: Supported: iTerm2, Hyper, Windows Terminal, VSCode terminal
Falls back to text (URL) format automatically
Configure fallback: terminalLink(text, url, { fallback: fn })

common_errors.pattern: want custom fallback|no fallback shown|fallback format
causes: Default fallback may not be desired
solutions: Or disable: { fallback: false } to return just text
